BillingPeriodItem.name: BillingPeriodItem
BillingPeriodItem.description: Represents one payment period for a subscription. The billing period item is used to pass billing information to an invoice line item in Subscription Management.

Amount.description: Price for the billing period item. Used to calculate the invoice line's Amount field.

BillingPeriodEndDate.description: Used to calculate the invoice line's end date.

BillingPeriodItemNumber.description: System-defined number that refers to the billing period item.

BillingPeriodStartDate.description: Used to calculate the invoice line's start date.

BillingScheduleId.description: Parent billing schedule of the billing period item.

CurrencyIsoCode.description: Contains the ISO code for any currency allowed by the org. Available only for orgs with the multicurrency feature enabled.

InvoiceBatchRunId.description: Parent invoice batch run of the billing period item.

InvoiceLineId.description: This field looks up to the invoice line that's generated from the billing period item. This field is populated only when a billing period item is generated via an invoice batch run. Otherwise, this field is empty.

InvoiceStatus.description: Status of the invoice that contains the invoice line created from the billing period item.

Status.description: Status of the billing period item. Draft billing period items aren't evaluated for invoice line creation.
